name: com.rossogames.rossoforge-services
description: Is a lightweight and thread-safe Service Locator designed for Unity. It provides a centralized way to register, retrieve, and manage services at runtime without relying on static singletons.

samples.description: Demonstrates how to register and use a player health service via the RossoForge Service Locator. Includes a UI label that updates with HP changes and an enemy that applies damage.
Prefab and sample scripts for using Update, FixedUpdate and LateUpdate in services
